10612.quoteText:
Age

You warrant that you are at least 13 years old. You warrant that you are at least 18 years old, if you indicate as such in your user settings.
10612.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
tosdr.tldr: According to the Terms of Service, users must be at least 13 years of age in order to use the service, and you warrant that you are at least 18 years old, if you indicate as such in your user settings.

10613.quoteText:
Ruqqus Content Policy

Ruqqus.com is a free speech environment. However, in order to comply with US law, and in order to ensure the safety of our users, there are a few things you are not permitted to do with the Ruqqus platform.
10613.title: Users agree to comply with the law of the service's country

tosdr.case: Users agree to comply with the law of the service's country
tosdr.tldr: Users may not upload to, embed within, or link out from ruqqus.com anything not legal to publish within, or export from, the United States of America.

10614.quoteText:
Legal Forms

Ruqqus grants you the ability to use your ruqqus.com account to send us certain types of legal forms through our help portal. These include, but are not limited to:

  • DMCA takedown request
  • DMCA takedown counter-request
  • Subpoenas and court orders

You agree to refrain from making abusive or frivolous submissions to these forms. Additionally, you acknowledge that these forms are provided for the sake of convenience and speed, and that Ruqqus does not waive any of its rights regarding legal process, including the right to object for lack of proper service.

Ruqqus considers abusive and frivolous submissions to be submissions with a clear lack of legal justification. Examples include: nonsensical data, duplicate submissions, DMCA takedown requests for content that isn't your intellectual property, or legal demands from someone lacking the authority to make such a demand.
10614.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim

tosdr.case: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim
tosdr.tldr: Ruqqus grants you the ability to use your ruqqus.com account to send certain types of legal forms through their help portal.

10615.quoteText:
Intellectual Property

You may not upload to, embed within, or link out from ruqqus.com:

  1. Copyrighted material that you are not authorized to distribute
  2. Anything not legal to publish within, or export from, the United States of America
10615.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content

tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit illegal content
tosdr.tldr: Users may not upload to, embed within, or link out from ruqqus.com anything not legal to publish within, or export from, the United States of America.

10620.quoteText: At our discretion, Ruqqus may share your information with United States law enforcement in the event of an emergency, if we have good cause to believe that doing so would avert or mitigate the emergency.
10620.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

10621.quoteText:
Account Access

Your ruqqus.com account is nontransferable. You will not buy, sell, gift, loan, or otherwise grant a third party access to your ruqqus.com account. You will not provide a third party with your ruqqus.com password or two-factor authentication codes.

In the event that your ruqqus.com account is accessed by a third party anyways, you remain accountable for all actions taken by your account.
10621.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

tosdr.case: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

10623.title: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible

tosdr.case: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible
tosdr.tldr: 'It is Ruqqus LLC policy to decline to share user information with law enforcement, except as required by law or in the event of an emergency. Emergency requests are considered on a case-by-case basis, favoring user privacy in such considerations.'

10624.quoteText: Any user, whose content has been removed pursuant to such a request, may submit a DMCA counter-notification.
10624.title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself

tosdr.case: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself
tosdr.tldr: 'Any user, whose content has been removed pursuant to such a request, may submit a DMCA counter-notification.'

10625.quoteText: These terms of service are governed by, and shall be interpreted in accordance with, the laws of the state of New Hampshire.
